alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 01 at 2:55AM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches from 6000 to 7000 feet. Higher amounts of 4 to 12 inches above 7000 feet. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado, and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Hazardous conditions will impact commutes. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 7 to 11 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 1 to 2 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
